Company April 4, 2017

Hola, Mexico.

You know what’s amazing? People love Nest so much, they’ll buy our products even if they have to figure out a way to get them. Like fly to another country. Or get a friend to ship them anything Nest. That’s because until this year Nest was only available in seven countries. Since January, Nest has expanded to Austria, Germany, Italy and Spain. And starting today, Nest Cam will be available to our next-door neighbor, Mexico.

That means millions more homes can become Nest homes. If you live in Mexico, you can buy Nest Cam online at Amazon, Best Buy, Liverpool, Palacio de Hierro or Walmart.com.mx. Then you can check in on your casa from anywhere with the Nest app. You can sign up for Nest Aware services - intelligent phone alerts and video storage - so you’ll know when something happens at home. And it’s all in Spanish, from setting up Nest Cam to using the Nest app to getting support.

Lights, locks, and other products can work with Nest Cam. And you don’t have to do a thing. Like when you’re not home, Philips hue or LIFX lights turn on automatically so it seems like you are. Look for the Works with Nest logo on products at local retail stores or find out more at workswith.nest.com.

We’re excited for Nest Cam to help keep even more homes and families safe in Mexico. And we’ll continue to bring Nest products to new countries. Because we believe the world is one big neighborhood.

  • Tweet
Matt Rogers
Founder and Chief Product Officer
